content: approximately 10 sts per 3 inches and 8 row per 3 inches worked in pattern this simple to crochet soap saver bag works as a small gift bag too lily sugar n cream yarn will also work well for this project this pattern was originally designed by danyel pink it is now available exclusively at oombawka design crochet > danyel pink has sold the full > copyright for this pattern and all > associated images to oombawka design > ltd ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2022 oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
